posts.name: Duke's Grill
posts.note: Duke's Grill has been around since 1951 in the Five Points area of Monroe before moving to its current location. From what I have heard you need to get chili, slaw, and onions.

posts.name: South 21 Drive In
posts.note: Old-fashioned, drive-in stop for classic American comfort food with curb service since 1955. You need to order yourself a Super Boy.
